comment: Export to JSON plugin for PHPMyAdmin

data.title: Type-A-thon (Only for Desktop)
data.content: I designed and developed a web game using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript that features falling random letters. Players must press the corresponding key on their keyboard to advance through the levels. The project highlights my skills in front-end web development and my ability to create engaging user experiences.I also had user testing for this website with keyboard accessibility. Click to see detail report: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1DjX9U7--HYk4tP0MZTrc21EPIx75BfPp/edit?usp=sharing&ouid=109259461841611412607&rtpof=true&sd=true

data.title: EasyTravel
data.content: This project showcases my skills in HTML, CSS and JavaScript by creating a web application that allows users to create their own travel itineraries. Users can select the province they want to visit and filter the results by categories such as attractions, activities, food and accommodation. The data for the provinces and categories is hard-coded using an array of objects.

data.title: Mehdi Art House
data.content: This project demonstrates my skills in Node.js, Pug and MongoDB by creating a web application that connects talented artists with art lovers. Users can browse a diverse collection of stunning art pieces and contact the artists directly. Users can also create their own profiles, upload their artworks. The web application uses MongoDB to store the user and art data, Pug to render the dynamic web pages, and Node.js to handle the server-side logic.

data.title: BashBliss
data.content: I created a CMS system that allows event planners to create and manage their own websites for various types of events. Users can customize their websites with their own branding and content. Database is created with PHPmyAdmin on infinityfree. When user select one category of event it goes detail of that category page with use of JavaScript Param method which collect category_id and do filter all events with that category_id and shows result. If you go from event page from menu it will shows all stored value in event table in Database.

data.title: EasyPlan
data.content: This website is create with node.js, EJS with use of countriesnow, google place, google map and openweather API. Manipulating API data as per need and create as per user friendly. During this project work, I learn in detail of OOPS, API and analyse user needs.

data.title: Portfolio-CMS
data.content: Porfolio-CMS is created in laravel and connected contact form with node server. The source code attached in this website is for Laravel. Export the json file and create frontend by use of React.js. This project is practice of MVC structure, React, OOPS conecept and responsive design. When user fill contact for on submit POST request handle using node server. Fetch real time data and send email to link email address.

data.title: Capstone Project (Work in progress)
data.content: Full stack application with MERN stack. Platform where people gather for business as freelance. Where worker will work on their hobby/professional can work part time or full time. And buyer will get service in good rate and value.
